remarks: Functionality of map from vectors to functionals with closed kernels. (Contributed by NM, 30-May-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hdmapfn.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmapfn.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapfn.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmapfn.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapfn.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmapfnN $p |- ( ph -> S Fn V ) $.
